comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Lange was a Swedish born adventurer and Amazon explorer. He latr became a US citizen. There's some good links to bio records from Sachi Clayton's blog at the New York Public Library here: www.nypl.org/blogs/2008/03/17/discovering-algot-lange I suspect that Rear Admiral "Carvatho" is actually Rear Admiral Jose Carlos de Carvalho of Brazil, and I'm working on confirmation.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Yep. It's Rear Admiral Jose Carlos de Carvalho in the center. See a drawing here: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D01E1D6113AE6... And this New York Times item from September 28, 1912 tells of the meeting between Rear Admiral de Carvalho and Algot Lange : query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9B03E2DF133CE6...

comment._content: Thanks!  We'll fix the name in the source data and reload the description.
